Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies enter the four-game series with thoughts of clinching a postseason berth at home.
The Phillies currently lead the NL Wild Card standings at +4.0 games including a +2.5-game lead over the Arizona Diamondbacks for the top NL Wild Card spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies magic number to clinch a 2023 MLB Postseason berth is six (hence, The Big Piece!).
The Phils' magic number to earn the top NL Wild Card spot is 7.
The final spots in the NL Wild Card race belong to the Chicago Cubs with the Miami Marlins lurking 0.5-games out of the final spot.
Others: The Phillies vs. Mets series will take place from September 21-24, with the Mets visiting Citizens Bank Park for the four-game series.
